price: 7. Waxay yaqaanaan (dadku) daahirka muuqaalka nolosha adduunkan, nolosha dambe se (Aakhirada) way moog yihiin.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَٰهِرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamūna ẓāhiran mina al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum ʿani al-ākhirati hum ghāfilūna
